house_listing.house_description: Exciting new project offers spacious floor plans with terrific views of city marina and lynn.River. This 24 unit complex offers covered parking, elevator, huge assigned storage, 9'ceil,private patios, wide hallways & 2/3 bdrm plans.
house_listing.firm_name: The Prudential Decker Realty The Prudential Decker Realty
